features.featureTitle: Rework `frontend/src/utils/pdfDownload.ts` so `downloadPDF(htmlContent, filename)` no longer uses jsPDF/html2canvas (including any dynamic CDN loading), and instead exports via a simple popup-window print flow: (1) `window.open` a new blank popup window, (2) write the full `htmlContent` into the popup via `popupWindow.document.write(htmlContent)`, (3) set `popupWindow.document.title` to the provided `filename` (example: "Hans_Mueller_FES-2024-0001_2026-02-18"), (4) call `popupWindow.print()`, and (5) close the popup after printing.

Update `frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx` so the Export PDF action builds a filename string from the client’s `firstName`, `lastName`, `accountId`, and today’s date, and passes that filename string to `downloadPDF(pdfHtml, filename)`. Keep `generateClientPDF(client, mockDetailData)` unchanged and keep all other pages unchanged.
